title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is no longer displayed, even though it is saved in the XML source.
EB: The expected behavior is that the target bookmark set in a drill-through link should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog, ensuring that the selected bookmark is visible and accessible to the user.
SR:
1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog.
2. Set a bookmark in a drill-through link.
3. Close the Hyperlink Options dialog.
4. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.
